EmailTemplate.name: RS - SLP - Withdraw Change
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave Solar Loan - Withdraw a Change
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
{!partnerName} withdrew a change to your Solar Loan application. You don't need to take any action at this time.
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Solar {!Organization.Street} Boston, MA {!Organization.PostalCode}
Questions or concerns about solar? Call us at 844.786.4100 Email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
